articles.title: Beyoncé finally wins best album Grammy: 'It's been many years' - BBC.com
articles.description: Beyoncé wins the Grammys main prize on her fifth attempt, and 25 years after her first nomination.
articles.content:
Mark Savage
Beyoncé now has 35 Grammy Awards - more than any artist in history
Correcting what was widely seen as an historic wrong, Beyoncé won best album at the 67th Grammy Awards in Los Angeles.… [+8627 chars]

articles.title: Lady Gaga Declares ‘Trans People Are Not Invisible’ in Grammy Speech - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Lady Gaga declared that trans people "are not invisible" and "deserve love" at this year's Grammys.
articles.content: Lady Gaga used the Grammy stage to stand up for trans rights. While accepting the Best Pop Duo/Group Performance award for “Die With a Smile,” the pop star made a bold statement about transgender rig… [+1888 chars]

articles.title: Best red carpet looks at the 2025 Grammy Awards - CNN
articles.description: Guests struck a comparatively restrained note in all-black outfits and muted colors — but there were still plenty of feathers, ruffles and sparkle at the 67th Annual Grammy Awards.
